products.title: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
products.small-description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation.
products.description: Experience crystal-clear audio with these wireless headphones featuring advanced noise-cancellation technology, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable over-ear design.

products.title: Smartphone X12
products.small-description: Latest model smartphone with advanced camera system.
products.description: Capture life's moments with stunning clarity using the X12's triple-lens camera system. Featuring a powerful processor, 5G capability, and an edge-to-edge OLED display.

products.title: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.small-description: Comfortable chair with lumbar support for long work hours.
products.description: Enhance your work-from-home setup with this ergonomic office chair. Featuring adjustable height, tilt, and armrests, with breathable mesh back for all-day comfort.

products.title: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV
products.small-description: 55-inch 4K TV with HDR and built-in streaming apps.
products.description: Immerse yourself in stunning 4K resolution and vibrant colors. This smart TV comes with popular streaming apps pre-installed and voice control for easy navigation.

products.title: Stainless Steel Kitchen Knife Set
products.description: Elevate your culinary skills with this premium knife set. Includes chef's knife, bread knife, utility knife, paring knife, and more, all stored in a stylish wooden block.

products.title: Wireless Gaming Mouse
products.description: Gain a competitive edge with this responsive wireless gaming mouse. Features customizable RGB lighting, programmable buttons, and up to 16,000 DPI for precise control.

products.title: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Take your music anywhere with this rugged, waterproof Bluetooth speaker. Enjoy deep bass and clear highs for up to 20 hours on a single charge.

products.title: Fitness Smartwatch
products.small-description: GPS-enabled smartwatch with health tracking features.
products.description: Monitor your fitness goals with this advanced smartwatch. Tracks heart rate, sleep, and various workout types, with built-in GPS and smartphone notifications.

products.title: Electric Coffee Grinder
products.small-description: Stainless steel grinder with multiple grind settings.
products.description: Enjoy freshly ground coffee every morning with this electric grinder. Features multiple grind settings for French press, drip, espresso, and more.

products.title: Wireless Charging Pad
products.description: Simplify your charging setup with this sleek wireless charging pad. Compatible with all Qi-enabled devices, providing fast and efficient charging.
